t:
Just another man am I,
Just never doing anything, that's no lie.
Just a coward who never acknowledges his part,
Just now understanding, it's not about being
                                                                 smart.

Just about being better than yesterday,
Just my inner voice keeping me company, I say.
Just tried to communicate, but no answer came,
Just my mind disconnected from my body, such
                                                            a shame.
c:
Just missing everything I couldn't appreciate or value,
Just thought it was endless, but that's not true.
Just a man incapable of knowing worth,
Just until he has nothing left on this earth.

Just his memories remain in the end,
Just coming back to the land I belong to, my friend.
Just not the end of the world, you see,
Just the beginning of a new one for me.



If you are good with words, you might like this: https://sherlockdoyle.github.io/antonemo/ (link also available in profile)


Here's your prompt for the Day 114 of Writing Sprints.
